About me

Hello! I'm Adam Troxell, a Full Stack Developer, Quality Assurance enthusiast, and consultant, with a passion for creating seamless and dynamic web applications. I recently completed an intensive 20-week Full Stack Development program at Emerging Digital Academy, where I honed my skills in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and testing frameworks like Cypress to ensure robust and reliable code.

In addition to my technical skills, I have experience consulting on portfolio and web design to help others create visually appealing, functional sites. With years of experience in technical support, project ownership, and leadership, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and a customer-centric focus to my work. My background includes roles as a Solutions Manager, Customer Coordinator, and Technical Support Specialist, where I developed a deep understanding of user needs and the importance of delivering high-quality solutions.

I also have a proven track record in managing and leading projects to successful completion. My background in quality assurance through Cypress testing has further enhanced my ability to produce polished, user-friendly applications. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn and adapt to new challenges. My goal is to leverage my diverse skill set to build innovative solutions that make a positive impact.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new travel destinations, cruising with my wife, or enjoying the thrills of theme parks. I'm a progressive thinker who values diversity, inclusivity, and continuous learning.

Projects

ùïéùïé

WanderWise

WanderWise is a comprehensive travel planning application designed to streamline the process of organizing trips. It offers features such as detailed trip itineraries, dynamic packing lists, and map locations, ensuring that users have all their travel information in one place. Built with React, Redux, Express, and PostgreSQL, WanderWise showcases my ability to integrate multiple technologies to create a user-friendly and efficient solution for travel planning. Whether you're preparing for a short getaway or a long journey, WanderWise helps you stay organized and ready for your adventure.

>

View the project

Energy Audit Portal

A proof-of-concept web application designed to replace RJ Energy Solutions' Google Sheets workflow for tracking equipment, costs, and carbon footprint. The portal allows auditors and employees to input data on facility equipment and provides recommendations to increase energy efficiency and reduce CO2 expenditure. Built with React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Redux, Passport.js, and Material UI, the app features a user-friendly interface for managing facility information, conducting energy audits, and reviewing completed audits.


View on github
